TEI.2.document_title: A Martinez de Lejarsa to Stephen F Austin, 06-21-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Agustín Martinez de Lejarsa to Austin, Nacogdoches, June 21, 1881. Asking Austin to forward his petition for 8 leagues of land. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 668
